ISI.Description: Interval between two-pulse stimuli. Applies only to TWO-PULSE condition

trial_type.Description: Categorical code referring to stimulus condition

Levels.7: PLAID (two superimposed oriented gratings, contrast level 5)
Levels.8: CIRCULAR (eight superimposed oriented gratings, contrast level 5)
Levels.31: TWOPULSE-1 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 1)
Levels.32: TWOPULSE-2 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 2)
Levels.33: TWOPULSE-3 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 3)
Levels.34: TWOPULSE-4 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 4)
Levels.35: TWOPULSE-5 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 5)
Levels.36: TWOPULSE-6 (two pattern stimuli shown for fixed duration, with interval duration 6)

trial_name.Description: Description of the stimulus category that was shown during this experiment (see trial_type)

stim_file.Description: Name of the stimulus mat file that was shown during this trial of the experiment

stim_file_index.Description: Index of the stimulus in the images field of the stimulus mat file
